org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power
Class PowerVmAllocationPolicySingleThreshold

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
      org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicySimple
          org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicySingleThreshold

public class PowerVmAllocationPolicySingleThreshold
extends VmAllocationPolicySimple

PowerVmAllocationPolicySingleThreshold is an VMAllocationPolicy that chooses a host with the least power increase due to utilization increase caused by the VM allocation.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov
